readable.title: 3417662443_2eaea88977
readable.content: A bearded man wears a roughly sewn hooded costume emblazoned with images of Spiderman . A grown man wears an outfit made of a Spider-Man bedspread . a man wearing a spiderman outfit with a mask covering his face also . A person wearing a spiderman print outfit looks up with a hood on his face . The man is wearing a spiderman outfit .
